entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Akulivik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 03:49 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Ice Crystals, -41.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Akulivik Airport 08:00 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

Dewpoint: -46.5°C

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 35.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 35. Wind chill minus 52 this morning and minus 45 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h after midnight. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 45 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Saturday 18 February 2023
